titles.title: Astronaut Ground Travel Support Act
Astronaut Ground Travel Support Act
Astronaut Ground Travel Support Act
A bill to provide for the authorized use of Federal vehicle transportation by certain astronauts.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cruz without amendment. With written report No. 119-82.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 193.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
